CustomField.description: The amount of records passed into each batchable job in the event that Rollup batches. Default is 2000, which is the vanilla Salesforce default.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The amount of records passed into each batchable job in the event that Rollup batches. Default is 2000, which is the vanilla Salesforce default.
CustomField.label: Batch Chunk Size
